Percy Helton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percy_Helton 0 Percy Alfred Helton (January 31, 1894 – September 11, 1971) was an American stage, film, and television actor. He was one of the most familiar faces and voices in Hollywood of the 1950s. Percy_Alfred_Helton ( January_31_,_1894 – September_11_,_1971 ) was an_American_stage , film , and television_actor . He was one of the_most_familiar_faces_and_voices in Hollywood of the_1950s .
